definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.
sentences.chinese: 系統利用命中即摧毀技術，摧毀敵方的彈頭。

sentences.english: The buffer pool hit ratio is now showing excellent results.
sentences.chinese: 現在的緩衝池命中率就顯示了較好的結果。

sentences.english: "They shot first and missed, " he commented.
sentences.chinese: 緬軍先開槍，未能命中目標。

sentences.english: How many items has your boyfriend hit?
sentences.chinese: 你的男朋友命中了多少項？

sentences.english: Instrumentation on the target verified that the surrogate high-energy laser hit the target.
sentences.chinese: 目標導彈上的儀器覈實替代高能激光準確命中目標。

sentences.english: He also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his son.
sentences.chinese: 他也預先命中註定適合他兒子的形象。

sentences.english: For example, with this affinity there would be a higher cache-hit rate.
sentences.chinese: 例如，使用此關聯會產生較高的緩存命中率。

sentences.english: Perhaps this already fated, hide is hard to hide away.
sentences.chinese: 這或許早已命中註定，躲是躲不掉了。

sentences.english: I just knew she was the one.
sentences.chinese: 我就知道她是我命中註定的那位。

sentences.english: It was his destiny never to see his wife or children again.
sentences.chinese: 他命中註定再也見不到他的妻子兒女了。

sentences.english: When the projectile Fei Da hit angle is big, the shell explodes the fragment can disperse evenly.
sentences.chinese: 當彈丸飛達命中角度大，炮彈爆炸的碎片能均勻飛散。

sentences.english: Rebounding was his way of atoning for his inaccuracy.
sentences.chinese: 但籃板彌補了他在命中率方面的劣勢。

sentences.english: She was portioned with sorrow throughout her life.
sentences.chinese: 她命中註定一輩子受苦。

sentences.english: As fate would have it, I was juliet.
sentences.chinese: 就像命中註定一樣，我演茱莉葉。

sentences.english: This makes misses, dodges and parries a lot less painful.
sentences.chinese: 這使得未命中，躲閃，招架不那麼讓人痛苦。

sentences.english: It seemed to be her fate to become involved with men whose presence cheapened her.
sentences.chinese: 似乎她命中註定要與那些瞧不起她的男人攪和在一起。

definition: to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
to collude with/to collaborate/(basketball) hook shot
to return a compliment/to give sth in return
to reverse (the score)/to pull off a comeback/to take the lead
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
